valsi.definition: ah, oh (an exclamation of understanding, recognition)
get accustomed/used (a koysa - to smth), get into the habit of
admit (grant entrance, whether into a place or into the mind)
flow towards, rush towards, stream towards
flow, flood (of tide), rising tide; influx, inflow
regret, pity; (exklami) alas! it is a pity!
eat with, eat smth after drinking
agitation (for the meaning “stirring up of public interest” one can use also “agitasion”)
agitate (also to stir up public interest in a cause)
fire (occurrence of fire in a certain place)
let's go, come along (invitation to go somewhere)
account (a registry of pecuniary transactions; a subscription to a service)
activity (the state or quality of being active)
actual (acting at the present moment - cf. “reale”)
when doing smth, while, at, under (simultaneity, circumstances)
lane, walk, path (in a garden, park, etc., generally between rows of trees)
American (an inhabitant of the Americas; cf. “USA-jen”)
American (of or pertaining to the USA or the American culture; American man)
American (of or pertaining to the Americas)
animate, endow with life; enliven, give animation to
appear (come into existence; to become visible - cf. “sembli”)
apply (put on, upon, or to; put to or adapt for a special use; put into action)
arrange (plan or prerare for; bring about or come to an agreement; settle)
argument (statement put forth as proof, reason)
arrive (at destination, at a certain place)
full of aroma, aromatic, fragrant or sweet-smelling
article (a part of speech in some languages)
assemble""":""" collect, bring together (people, materials, etc.)
aspire, desire eagerly, long for, aim at, seek after
move aside, draw aside; step aside
be attentive to, heed, mind, pay attention to
outside of, on the outside, beyond the limits of
foreigner, a person from a foreign country (cf. "gariba")
foreigner, a person from a foreign country (cf. "gariba")
authority (power to influence or persuade resulting from knowledge or experience - cf. "mahta")
hopefully, maybe, perhaps, with luck we may
ring, resound; play (a musical instrument); strike (about the clock)
1) back (in space or time), backwards; 2) ago
the back (back side, reverse side, or area behind) (also “baktaraf”)
1) band (strip; a part of spectrum); ribbon; 2) band (group)
dresser (cupboard or set of shelves for dishes or kitchen utensils)
1) by, with, by means of (a means or tool); 2) by (doer or author)
devil (as a half-animal creature, not Satan, not the chief one)
1) You are welcome! (a reply to thanking); 2) Bless you! (after smb's sneezing); 3) Good luck! (when parting)
will you be so kind as, please
blade (of a knife, sword; of an oar, propeller)
blessed, connected with God's grace; beneficial
border (outer edge; frontier), brink; edge; board (of ship)
not in the least, not at all, not a bit
buffet (a counter or sideboard from which food and drink are served or may be bought)
day free from work, day off, rest-day
irrelevant, out of place, having nothing to do with
irrelevant, out of place, having nothing to do with
in a low voice, in an undertone
exchange (a place for trading, such as a stock exchange)
bust (head and shoulders of body; woman's bosom)
button (fastener; device meant to be pressed; bud)
convenient; comfortable; handy, easy-to use; opportune
beware (of), be on one’s guard against, take care
draw liquids, scoop (out); (fig.) to take, borrow
go out, leave, exit; issue (from); ooze out; come out, be issued
tuft (cluster of elongated strands, as of yarn, hair, or grass)
going out, leaving, withdrawal; exit, way out; outlet
in order to, in order that, so that
distance (a considerable amount of space), expanse, remoteness
married or widowed woman; dame; lady; (in cards, chess, checkers) a queen
1) then (at that time; in that case); 2) suffix for container then
virtue (moral excellence, an example or kind of it - cf. "merita")
bygone, distant in time, ancient, old
dedicate (address or inscribe to another - cf. “devoti”)
be decadent, be in state of decay, decline (physically or morally)
demand (claim; desire to purchase goods; request for some product)
take off, lay off, put off
destination (ultimate purpose for which smth is created or intended - cf. “safara-gola”)
determine (establish or ascertain definitely, give direction to, fix the limits of)
devotion (act of devoting or the state of being devoted)
director (person chosen to control or govern the affairs of an institution or corporation)
directing; direction (guidance; the skill of directing a film, play etc.)
design (shape, appearance, plan for the structure and functions)
design, lay out, make a design
disturb, trouble, bother, unsettle, put out of order
wonder at, marvel, look with amazement
precedes a specific characteristic, distinctive feature, or destination of object
German (relating to ethnicity, language or country); German (person of German ethnicity); German language
give as a gift; donate; make a present (cf. “dai”)
pressure, stress, force, push, dash; urge, drive
uncompromising, steadfast, firm, unflinching, inflexible, unbending
lead (guide or conduct), conduct (manage, carry on - cf. "kondukti")
having a hole; full of holes
cope with, manage, overcome, deal effectively
"one time or suddenly" (single or momentary action)
economy (sparing use or example/result of it)
economical (prudent; intended to save money), economy (economical or inexpensive to buy or use)
elaborate (work out with care and detail)
Greek (relating to ethnicity, language or country); Greek (person of Greek ethnicity); the Greek language
emerge (from a liquid); (fig.) rise into view
emphasize, stress, single out as important
arise, start to exist, spring up
be bored, feel dull, have a tedious time (cf. “tedi”)
is, are, am (the present tense of "bi")
essential (showing essence; of high importance; also biochem.)
Spanish (relating to ethnicity, language or country); Spanish (person of Spanish ethnicity); Spanish language
Esperantist (of, relating to, or characteristic of Esperanto)
establish (set up, bring into force, settle)
European (person living or originating from Europe)
show with obviousness, be eloquent of
(coordinating conjunction introducing new, often little expected circumstances)
examine (determine the qualifications by means of questions or exercises)
examine (inspect, study, check the condition or health of)
expand (to develop in volume or surface, spread, widen, also fig.)
expire (to come to an end (of time), terminate)
exposition (act or example of exposing; a public exhibition or show, as of artistic or industrial developments)
expose (to subject or allow to be subjected; to set in public view, introduce to, exhibit)
express (smth quick, e.g. a means of transport, such as a train, that travels rapidly)
extirpate, uproot; destroy wholly, eradicate, weed out
1) "to get, to become"; 2) optional marker of intransitivity
be amazed, be astonished, marvel, wonder
fabulous (of the nature of a fable; unhistorical)
it is dawning, day is breaking
make one’s way (to), direct one’s steps, head
ignite, catch fire, burst into flames, take fire, blaze up
anything portioned off, as a compartment, division (in a desk), stall (in a stable); branch, province, department, speciality (in a business, profession, government, field of knowledge)
"to do, to perform action connected with" (only in combination with nouns or adverbs)
indulge in debauch(ery), lead a depraved/loose/dissolute life
take an interest (in smth – om koysa)
be in stupor; become numb, stiffen
fine (very small in size, weight, or thickness; refined; subtle)
grow light(er), grow/become clear, clear up
relax, loosen (become loose or less tense)
lighten (become light or lighter in weight or seriousness)
touchy, susceptible, quick to take offence
find room, go in, be placed
make oneself ready, get ready, prepare (for smth - fo koysa)
smell (to have a smell; to sense a smell)
move up, go up, rise; turn up (intr.)
move up, go up, rise; turn up (intr.)
favour (an approving attitude, good will; an act performed out of good will, generosity, or mercy)
favour (treat or regard with kindness, befriend)
get warm, warm up, grow warm
an iron thing; piece of iron
fat(ty) tail (of certain breeds of sheep)
trust, confide in, have faith in; rely on
figure (outside form, shape of a body; appearance, representation; also geom.)
figure (to be pertinent or involved, appear - cf. “kalkuli, konti”)
row, line; queue, file (a line of persons or things)
film (medium used to capture images; motion picture)
fit, be of the right size; suit (to accord with - see also "godi")
ignite, catch fire, burst into flames, take fire, blaze up
flesh (the soft parts of the body; the physical being)
whisk, flit, dart, slip (expresses a sudden quick movement)
1) for (the object, aim, or purpose); 2) for (duration or a specific time)
1) (konekti) from; of (from among); 2) phone, telephone (shortening of "telefon")
background (but not person's experience, training, or education)
frame (framework as of a machine, as of a picture; context)
French (relating to ethnicity, language or country); French (person of French ethnicity); French language
fringe (part of the hair that hangs down over the forehead)
front (battlefront; field of activity; group or movement - cf. "avana", "frenta")
frown (wrinkle the brow, as in thought or displeasure); wrinkle (the brow)
fulfill (carry out, bring to completion, satisfy), come true
foundation (that on which anything rests; groundwork, underpinnings; (fig.) basis, ground)
turbid, muddy (not bright or pure, not clear, cloudy; lacking luster, dull)
(one) should, (one) ought, supposed to; befit, become
collar (band around an animal’s neck - cf. “kolar”)
err, be wrong, make a mistake
wedlock, marriage (the state of being married)
higher (advanced in complexity or elaboration; of education beyond the secondary level)
guarantee (anything that assures a certain outcome; a written declaration)
be a guest, be on a visit, stay
game (a kind of game; a stage of game - cf. “pleisa”)
generation (act or process of generating; origination, production, or procreation)
generate (bring into existence; engender, procreate; produce)
clan, ethnic group, family, kin, stock
get (to somewhere, into smth); fall (into a situation)
guide (serve as a guide; exert control or influence over)
stroke (move the hand over the surface of smth in one direction)
glimmer (emit or reflect a dim, intermittent light)
globe (a spherical model of Earth or any planet)
serve (to be convenient or favourable), suit (answer a purpose, be of use)
hump, hunch (deformity of the back in humans; the fleshy structure on the back of a camel)
a single stair, step, footstep; rung (step of a ladder)
cluster, bunch, a number of fruits or flowers growing along a common stalk
grasp (to take hold of or seize firmly; comprehend)
(phys. and fig.) gravitate, be attracted, tend to a center
grimace, make a grimace, contort the face, make a wry face
grimace, make a grimace, contort the face, make a wry face
grieve (feel sorrow or distress); mourn (om koysa - for smth)
taste (have a taste; sample the flavour of smth orally)
concern (have to do with, relate to, be of importance to)
"some time ago, at one time, earlier in life"
ha-ha, a sound made in imitation of laughter
defendant, the accused, prisoner at the bar
ring finger (finger between middle finger and little finger)
1) (kwel, kwo) Chinese (relating to ethnicity, language or country); 2) (kwo) khan
hand (to give or pass with the hands)
peasant house (esp. in Ukraine and Russia)
inherit, be the heir to; succeed (to)
Indian (relating to Indians [of India], their language and country); Indian (person of Indian ethnicity); Hindi
history (the aggregate of past events; science; record or narrative description)
hobby (activity that one enjoys doing in one's spare time)
hollow (having an empty space or cavity inside)
home (habitual abode, birthplace, native land, asylum)
honest (fair and straightforward in conduct, thought, etc., free from deceit or fraud, upright)
hook (catch, suspend, or connect with a hook)
behave like a hooligan, engage in hooliganism
humaneness, humanity (the quality of being humane, benevolence - cf. “jenley”)
hut (crude or makeshift dwelling or shelter; a shack)
i...i... - both...and... (komo) too, also (relates to the following word)
imagine (to form a mental image of something; to envision or create something in one's mind; to use one's imagination)
strike (against), run (against), run into, bump into, stumble upon
indication (act of pointing out; sign, token)
be indulgent, make allowance for, forbear to inflict
inflation (for the economical meaning “inflasion” is used)
English (relating to ethnicity, language or country); English (person of English ethnicity); English language
initiate (to set going by taking the first step; to introduce into a sosiety, club, etc. by formal rites)
slant, slope; physical tilt or bend; inclination (act; mental tendency)
encomber, obstruct, block, hinder in passing
immure, mure, wall up, brick up
be instead of, fill in, act as a substitute
inspire (by divine instruction, poetic spirit, ideas)
instruction (directions on procedure, a direction to be obeyed - cf. “talim”)
integral, entire, complete, whole, all parts properly united and present
between (them), in between; in the meantime
introduce (begin, preface; put inside or into; bring into use; provide smb with a beginning knowledge - cf. “prisenti”)
invalid (one who is sickly or disabled)
, (kwo) Italian (relating to ethnicity, language or country); Italian (person of Italian ethnicity); Italian language
jacket (a piece of a person’s suit)
jam (sweet mixture of fruit boiled with sugar)
gesture (motion of the limbs or body)
vein (blood vessel; nervure; lode; a long strip of a different colour - cf. “vena”)

cable (assembly of wires for electricity or a communications system)
cab, cockpit, cabin (compartment for driver, pilot, or user)
tracing paper; tracing paper copy; calque

look (try to see; to face or present a view), watch (view)
look (action of looking; expression of eyes), glance

career (occupation; the general course or progression of one's working life or one's professional achievements)
porridge, gruel, mush; squash; slush, mess, jumble

cut out (form or shape by severing or incising, e.g. making a dress)

which, who, that (introduces subordinate clause, replaces subject)

cock-a-doodle-doo; to crow (utter the shrill cry characteristic of a cock or rooster)

grow light(er), grow/become clear, clear up

press closely together, squeeze, tighten, clench

1) code (a system of signals or symbols - cf. “kodexa”); 2) coda
code (a systematic collection of laws or regulations - cf. “koda”)

1) as (in comparisons, references); 2) as, in the capacity of

composition (general makeup; a mixture or compound)

composition (act; a work of music, literature or art)

body (but not a group of persons or collection of particulars)

courtier (a person in attendance at a royal court)

work additionally, make some money on the side

severe (stern, harsh; very bad or intense)

general (of the majority of those involved; prevalent), universal (common to all)

sensual (of or pertaining to senses), sensory
feeling, sensation; emotion; sense (natural appreciation or ability - cf. "sens")

certain (fixed, settled; of a specific but unspecified character/degree/quantity)

1) at, in (refers to smb's abode, country); 2) in the work / writings of (refers to author); 3) in, with (refers to person or animal); (gramatika) active participle marker

shock (smth surprising; electric shock; medical emergency)
throw (esp. with great force or abruptly), hurl, fling
seat (object for sitting or connected with sitting)
dial (a graduated, circular scale over which a needle moves to show a measurement); (clock) face
significant (carrying meaning; having a covert or hidden meaning)
confident or connected with confidence, sure, secure and certain, safe, reliable, dependable
since, because, as, considering that (at the beginning of a clause)
without difficulty, easily, with no trouble
single (consisting of one part/aspect; undivided; individual and distinct - cf. “sole”)
miss (to feel the absence of someone or something, sometimes with regret), yearn, pine
sir, gentleman (a polite form of addressing or naming a male)
city (most ancient part of a town; the financial and commercial center; municipality - cf. “urba”)
citizen (person that is a legally recognized as a member of a state)
civil (pertaining to a citizen and his rights; not military or ecclesiastical), civic, civilian
scale (a system of ordered marks at fixed intervals; calibrated line; the ratio of depicted distance to actual distance; size, scope; - cf. "kaskasa", "pondidan")
scarf (a long garment worn around the neck)
excuse (forgive; make allowance for; serve as justification for)
fall with a plop, plop down
listen, strain one's ears to hear; auscultate
shift (group of workers or working period)
smear, anoint, daub, spread (a substance by rubbing)
snuffle, breathe heavily and noisily through the nose
solder (unite or repair parts with solder)
solid (reliable, upstanding and dependable; substantial - cf. “twerde”)
dream (to see imaginary events in one’s mind while sleeping - cf. “drimi”)
sprinkle, scatter in drops or particles
term (fixed space of time, time limit)
be in a certain state; be doing, feel, stand (about the matters)
stake (piece of wood pointed at one end)
stand (device for displaying information; section of an exhibition)
pole (a long slender piece of wood etc.), rod
stand (device to hold smth), strut, prop, stay
standing; stand (position), stance; point (stance taken by a hunting dog)
state (polity; a political division of a federation)
set, station, set up, put up; mount, install
steady, steadily; constant, regular, standing, permanent, persistent
stem, stalk (main axis of a plant)
step (move the foot in walking), pace, tread
stick (piece of wood; smth resembling a stick)
stretch (lengthen by pulling or when pulled (“tiri” – pull))
stop (act of stopping), stopping; cessation, cease
suffer (feel pain or distress; sustain loss, injury, harm, or punishment - cf. "subi", "toleri")
suggest (put an idea etc. into a person's mind - cf. "proposi")
convey, deliver (bring or transport to the proper place or recipient; distribute)
sole (underside of a shoe or foot)
subscribe (contract to receive; promise to contribute)
Swedish (relating to ethnicity, language or country); Swede; the Swedish language
myself, yourself etc. (common reflexive pronoun for all persons and numbers); (syao) self- (of oneself - сf. «selfa»)
Good luck! May fortune favour you! Everything good to you!
switch (set a switch into another position)
swing (move backward and forward; brandish; ride a swing)
string (esp. of a musical instrument or of a bow - cf. “korda”)
he, she, it; him, her (common for animate - cf. "it")
board (flat surface on which a game is played; flat surface used for writing or posting; name board); (name) tablet
so much, so many, thus much, so (to such an extent)
make oneself ready, get ready, prepare (for smth - fo koysa)
(in comparisons) kem pyu…tem pyu - the more...the more
term (a word having a particular meaning)
optional marker of a noun group; optional first element of the construction ti...na
team (a group organized to work or play together)
title (of a book, article, person), heading
trample (beat down with the feet, tread destructively), tramp on, trample down
heel (part of the foot on the backside only; the part of a shoe's sole is "kabluk")
gateaux, cake (especially a rich and elaborate one filled with custard, fruit, or nuts)
torture (infliction of severe physical pain as a means of punishment or coercion)
too, as well, also, likewise, similarly, like or in the same way as somebody or something else (cf. "yoshi")
through; over, across, to (on) the other side of
traffic (the passage of people or vehicles; the conveyance of messages or data)
defect, desert to the enemy, go over (to)
experience, go through, live through; survive (remain alive)
to read through (from begining to end)
trail, train (of a dress, of a comet)
pass the night, spend the night
transfer (convey or cause to pass from one place, person, or thing to another)
transform (change the form, nature, or function)
pass through, make one's way through
treatment (process or manner of treating); approach (method of dealing with)
treat (handle, deal with or behave towards); approach (an issue etc.)
hit, not miss; overtake, strike, befall, (med.) affect
train (a line of connected railroad cars)
trunk (of tree, of a human or animal)
troupe; herd, flock, troop, swarm; crowd
1) pipe, tube; barrel (of a gun); 2) tuba (mus.)
suffocate, strangle, choke, smother, stifle; drown (mask by a louder sound)
Turkish (relating to ethnicity, language or country); Turkish (person of Turkish ethnicity); Turkish language (also “turk-lingwa”)
immediately, at once, right away; tuy ke - as soon as
solid (not a liquid or gas); smth hard
tube (a flexible container with a screw top for pastelike substances)
An exclamation expressing tiredness or relief, appeasement
united, joined into a single entity
universal (common to all; useful for many purposes)
“-ever”""":""" kwo unkwe - whatever, kwel unkwe - whichever
firstly, in the first place; (taim-komo) at first, initially
urgent (compelling immediate action or attention, pressing)
urn (vessel for ashes of a deceased person)
make use of, utilize, avail oneself of
up, at the upper part of
vagabond, lead the life of a vagabond
at least, just; for example, say; whichever suits, if you like
vacant (not occupied; not filled with activity; empty)
value (numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed)
waste, squander; thwart, bring to naught
vessel (for holding liquids); vase (as for flowers, etc.)
revenge, revenge oneself, avenge (on smb - a koywan)
sight, vision, view (ability to see, act of seeing, smth seen)
vigor (exuberant and resiliant strength of body or mind, vitality)
sprightly, vivacious, brisk, zestful, cheerful, bright
vehicle (any means of transport; (fig.) a means of transmitting)
twine (encircle or coil around, esp. about vines; go in a winding course (Syn.""":""" serpi))
roll (up), form into spherical or cylindrical body, curl up, coil up
watch (the post or period of duty of a guard, sentinel, or watcher)
watch (keep a watchful eye on; guard)
cheek (the fleshy part of either side of the face)
redness in one’s cheeks, (high) colour, flush, blush
get warm, warm up, grow warm
small window; small opening window pane
wash up (to clean the utensils, dishes etc.)
pit (a hole in the ground); cavity
there is no, not available, no (cf. "ye")
member (a part of a whole; one who belongs to a group or organization - cf. "memba"); employee, worker, staff member; (syao) « member of»; «staff member performing a function connected with»
just (precisely, exactly); (gramatika) «just, only a moment ago» (immediate past marker)
enter, go in, come into; join, matriculate
concern oneself with, give one’s time to, devote oneself to, occupy oneself
